message: Let's make a deal! I take $70, you take $30. It's a good offer for you now, as the money will be worth less with each round.
I'm willing to give you a better deal than your last offer. We can both get more if we work together.

Bob, this is my final offer. It's better for you than the previous round, even with the inflation. If you decline, you'll be getting a much worse deal in the next round.  Let's be reasonable and end this here.
